collectionMetadata.name: Taxable Companies by Income Group, Annual
collectionMetadata.description:
Number of companies, amount of chargeable income and net tax assessed of taxable companies by chargeable income ranges for Year of Assessment (YA)2004 to YA2022. Income is assessed on a preceding year basis. The basis period for any YA is the financial year ending in the year preceding the YA.

* All figures are as at 31 March of the following year for each Year of Assessment (i.e. the YA2022 figures are as at 31 March 2023).

datasetMetadata.name: Taxable Companies by Chargeable Income Group (YA2008 - YA2023)
datasetMetadata.description: * There will be differences between the Net Tax Assessed (NTA) and the Tax Collection published on data.gov.sg. NTA is the net tax assessed to be payable or repayable by an entity after taking into account allowable tax credits, tax remission, tax rebates and tax deducted at source, for a specific tax period. This might be different from the amount of tax collected as the taxes could be collected or refunded across different Financial Years (FY) due to taxpayers paying their taxes via GIRO instalments or having their past years’ assessments reviewed.

datasetMetadata.name: Taxable Companies by Assessed Income Group (YA2004 - YA2007)
datasetMetadata.description: * There will be differences between the Net Tax Assessed (NTA) and the Tax Collection published on data.gov.sg. NTA is the net tax assessed to be payable or repayable by an entity after taking into account allowable tax credits, tax remission, tax rebates and tax deducted at source, for a specific tax period. This might be different from the amount of tax collected as the taxes could be collected or refunded across different Financial Years (FY) due to taxpayers paying their taxes via GIRO instalments or having their past years’ assessments reviewed.
